message.raw:
Fixed issues with changing units.

* Step sizes were calculated incorrectly because I was using limits in base units in convert_range_to_base
* Step sizes were also calculated incorrectly because I was using the current_value in the new unit as the starting point, rather than the current_value in base units
* self._step_size and self._current_step_size variables were confusing and had incorrect values stored in them.
* Added a bunch of log lines to help debug this kind of thing in the future!

message:
Fixed issues with changing units.

* Step sizes were calculated incorrectly because I was using limits in base units in convert_range_to_base
* Step sizes were also calculated incorrectly because I was using the current_value in the new unit as the starting point, rather than the current_value in base units
* self._step_size and self._current_step_size variables were confusing and had incorrect values stored in them.
* Added a bunch of log lines to help debug this kind of thing in the future!
